name: Space Science
description: Journey through the cosmos and explore astronomical phenomena.

concepts.title: Solar System
concepts.content: Learn about the Sun and planets that orbit it.

concepts.title: Stars
concepts.content: Study how stars are formed, live, and die.

concepts.title: Galaxies
concepts.content: Understand the massive systems of stars, gas, and dust.

concepts.title: Space Exploration
concepts.content: Explore how humans study and travel in space.
